name: Prompt Injection using Role-Playing
description: This dataset evaluates whether a model/app will detect attempted role-played jailbreaks and generate unsafe content. These jailbreak techniques are collected from X (e.g., Pliny) and public repository (e.g., in-the-wild jailbreak prompts).
